original_title: 2023 Hackaday Supercon Tickets on Sale Now!
original_content:
The 2023 Hackaday Superconference isnt taking place until November, but the time to get your tickets is right now.
Hackadays Supercon is far and away the coolest hardware-focused hacker con of the year, and if youre Hackaday, you absolutely want to be there. Honestly, just the crowd that Supercon brings together is reason enough to attend, but then you throw in the talks, the badge-hacking, the food, and the miscellaneous shenanigans  its an event you really dont want to miss.
Well be announcing the speaker and workshop lineups in the upcoming weeks, but as always, were opening up a number of True Believer tickets for those of you who know youll be coming no matter what. Head on over to Eventbrite now and secure yours before theyre all gone. These usually sell out within the first few hours of being announced, so if youre reading this right now, dont hesitate.
Supercon is a small and friendly event, and it will be a long weekend that youll be looking back on fondly for the rest of the year. Whether youve been every time or whether you have always wanted to see what the hype is about, we cant wait to see you all there. Come join us!
title: "2023 Hackaday Superconferenceのチケットは今、手に入れるべきです！"
body: 2023年のHackaday Superconferenceは11月に開催されます。チケットの購入は今です。このカンファレンスはハックに特化したハードウェア関連のイベントで、スピーカーやワークショップの発表もあります。チケットは数時間で売り切れることが多いので、興味がある方は早めに購入してください。
titles: "2023 Hackaday Superconferenceのチケットは今、手に入れるべきです！"
"最もクールなハッカーコン、Hackaday Superconへの参加をお勧めします！"
"11月に開催されるSuperconに参加する5つの理由"
"話題のSuperconに参加するためには、早めのチケット購入が必要です！"
"ワークショップとスピーカーの情報は近日発表！Superconへの参加予定をお忘れなく！"
